snippet: Rafael Nadal beat Jérémy Chardy putting him in both finals of the VTR Open in Chile. Nadal will play with Juan Monaco in the doubles final Sunday.
abstract: Rafael Nadal beats Jeremy Chardy to reach VTR Open finals in Chile; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal beat Jérémy Chardy putting him in both finals of the VTR Open in Chile. Nadal will play with Juan Monaco in the doubles final Sunday.

headline.seo: Rafael Nadal Reaches VTR Open Finals in Chile
headline.main: Nadal Reaches VTR Open Finals in Chile
